translation: In a clean spot, having established a firm seat of his own, neither too high nor too low, made of cloth, skin, and kusha grass layered one over the other.
commentary: 6.11 Shuchou in a clean? Spot in the country? installable having established? Stable firm? Asana seat? Atmanah his own? Not not? very high very high? Not not? very low very low? chailajinakushottara a cloth? skin and Good grass? one over the other.Commentary In this verse the Lord has prescribed the external seat for practicing meditation. Details of the pose are given in verse 13.Spread the Kusagrass on the ground
